description: An illustration of a dining booth table flanked by two benches: the tabletop is pale yellow and pale orange with a light green and blueish trim, pedestal and base; the benches are mostly red with black bases and a pale yellow stripe going down the center of each. The wall behind the table is black and white striped. On the table is a metal napkin dispenser and two shakers perhaps representing salt and pepper. The floor below the benches and table is checkered black and white.

author.name: VertexArchive
author.description: An UNOFFICIAL archive of the New York Times' Vertex puzzle. This account is not affiliated with the NY Times. I just like the triangles.
